snippet.title: Sanatorium - A Mental Asylum Simulator [Announcement Trailer]
snippet.description:
The year is 1923. The lines between modern psychiatric treatments and pseudoscience are still vague. Enter the Sanatorium to diagnose and treat your patients. Struggle with moral decisions and society’s expectations – but tread carefully, as your supervisors may discover… that you are an impostor.

WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2059090/Sanatorium__A_Mental_Asylum_Simulator/

Card-based workplace adventure gameplay
Diagnose, treat and heal patients with archaic methods or choose to be gentle
Each patient file is a card puzzle of symptoms hidden and visible
Story Campaign with 4 Chapters
Branching Story with multiple Endings
Endless Mode with rising difficulty
Over 100 Symptoms, Illnesses, and Treatment Cards
Upgrade and develop new cards, change treatments to be more humane

########## SUPPORT US ########

Join Our Discord https://discord.gg/USE5bJRHEH

Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLvjgpuAQLshZc12RXJ-GDw
